alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Hudson (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 6:59AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hudson, southeastern Bergen, southern Westchester, Bronx and New York (Manhattan) Counties through 745 AM EDT... At 658 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Union City, or over Secaucus, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Yonkers, New Rochelle, White Plains, Mott Haven, Hoboken, East Tremont, Hackensack, Bergenfield, Lyndhurst, Rutherford, Secaucus, Rye, Ridgefield, Midtown Manhattan and Harlem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
